content.detailedDescription: Object  was moving in the sky erratically.  seemed to be moving like a drone. object went past me, then seemed to come back over me.
content.summary: Object seems to fly past my house, then come back around and flew over me.

content.detailedDescription: It was 1982. i was 6 years old and was heading to bed, my mother, father and sister where in the house. anyways i went to bed, my room was at the top of the stairs in or 2 story home. so i go to sleep like any other night, i wake up in the early morning hours and iam laying at the front door of the condo, i start to freak out and start pounding on the door as it was still locked but as iam doing this i get this overwhelming feeling that there is something in the hallway with me, that's when i turn my head down the hall and see this head pop around the corner. i go completely bannannas and continue to pound on the door, when my mother finally got to the door she was just as baffled as i was because the deadbolt was still locked... this memory is still very vivid to me... i have told people about it before, but i figured it's time to share here to get a blasting from the internet... maybe iam crazy or maybe i was a kid with an active imagination. who knows... be nice to see if anyone else has experienced anything similar... this happened in canada on vancouver island...
content.summary: I was 6. went to sleep. woke in hallway. looked down hall saw alien pop head out. dead bolt was locked.

content.detailedDescription: My brother-in-law has a hunting area not far from our home. he has camaras posted in the hunting area to see if any deer come by the feed pile so he can hunt them. he always goes out every other day to retrive the disc from the camara to check the footage and see what, if anything has tripped the camara. the camara is a color , laser motion activated camara. when he downloaded the images he noticed the strange lights on the disc. he asked me to look at the pictures to see what i can make of it. i told him that they looked like "orbs". i replied to him that i have seen something like that on the mufon tv programs. he knows that i am a big fan of the tv shows and asked me to forward this information to mufon, hoping we can get an answer as to what the "orbs" can be. since these images were taken, no animals (deer, turkeys, squirrel, crows, racoons) have ever returned to the feed pile. in the attached photos, i am adding the picture prior to the light and after the light, so you can see the area during day light. note that the pictures have times and dates stamp on the bottom of the photo.
content.summary: Strange lights taken by hunting camara

content.detailedDescription: Was getting ready for bed and it was a bad thunderstorm with lightening that would like the sky. i looked out the bedroom window and i saw an object flying. with the flying pattern i knew it was not possible it was a plane. i took some pics but it was scary dark out unless the lightening lit the sky. i recorded it, i freaked out and called my younger sister who was in the same room to come and look at the ufo. she wouldn't. . i was worried they may take the sheep from my neighbour's farm. my cats kept jumping to the window and my sister screamed at them as she was worried they would take the cats.. my mom was telling me that our dog was uneasy from the same time frame and she couldn't help but shake non stop. she had a feeling something was going to happen. she was looking out the front window and said it was eery dark out. she too believes it was an alien/ufo. please note the pictures are to be turned sideways. the was the video i have and took a pic with phone. first pic is lightening and the object send pic is beam from object.
content.summary: During a lightening storm a ufo flew over neighbour's farm

content.detailedDescription:
it was late at night here in croydon(london),a few days ago. i was in the kitchen of my house taking some tap water, and i as always looked out side of the window into the stars as i like looking the star lights at night. but i noticed straight away that one of the stars was moving downwards it was going down and a bit to the left for a few seconds, i realise straight away it was a ufo, i was lucky to see,
then after a few second moving down and left a bit it stopped and stayed there, then later after one or two seconds a near by star light just went off, disappeared. and the other stayed on hovering stationed there where it stopped a few moments ago...
     the all time i knew it was a ufo and i remained cold and didn't took my eye  off the ufo, so i could see its next move.  the star remained there stationed for hours, then i went to sleep. was late at night, maybe one o clock in the morning.
for one moment i thought about getting a camera, but had no idea where my camera is, i rarely use it
      this all sighting was very intriguing, since now i know some of these stars in the sky are actually space craft.. and they are monitoring us here on earth..
the moving star was just like a star,, looked like a star , but was moving down from my view,, and the other near by swiched off the light off... and i saw the all thing.
i wonder if some one realy know what goes on out there...

i am happy to share any more info, as i am a ufo entusiast...
and that was my lucky day,, i hope i see a clear ufo like that again.
content.summary: I noticed a star moving down in the sky from my window,,

content.detailedDescription: Jaskldjflkasjdfkjasldkfja;lksdfjlasf
content.summary: Test sighting

content.detailedDescription: While hunting in quebec, i went out late at night to ..... while standing there i noticed a large bright orange object (too large for a star)to the ne. it was so bright it made an orange reflection on the still lake water. as i finished my business. i looked up in that direction again and it was gone, but looking out straight ahead to some islands about a quarter mile away (nne), i saw a large orange disk object. as it was high enough in the sky i saw three rotating circular lights revolving on the underside of the craft. it then went out considerably farther until it was just a very tiny orange dot.  one other hunter saw it just before me while it was still in the ne, but returned to hunt cabin.
content.summary: Noticed bright orange light in sky to ne. looked up again and saw disk shaped craft with three revolving lights on bottom of craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out large window, at the sky.  plane flying along heading west. the lights were like plane lights i thought. 
 then it looked like it was in trouble. thought it was going to crash, then shot off towards the n.W. and the harbor.  i checked the news, the news paper.  sure that somebody else must have seen it. if they did they never spoke up.  it made an impossibly sharp turn, and went down in a fast incline.  this was before i ever heard of u.S.O.  i knew no one would believe me.
content.summary: It looked like an airplane. thought it was going to crash. shot off to n.W. looked like it went down in grey's harbor.

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened when i was 12 years old.  i was in bed at night and looking out the window through my open curtains.  it would have been about 9 pm, maybe a little later.  the house next door was dark and the neighbors were away.  suddenly, in the yard between our houses, a glowing light appeared.  it was oval in shape and the lights it gave off were whitish but with many other colors mixed in. these lights seemed to shift and change but they made no shadows on the ground.  whatever this was seemed to simply materialize out of the air and was possibly about 10 feet off the ground.  it might have been just a few feet high but the size seemed to shift and change. the light appeared to open up and something began to come out.  

i was terrified and called out to my father who was passing my bedroom door on his way to bed.  he came in and sat by the window to watch it with me.  i asked him what it was and he said he didn't know.  i had the feeling we were seeing something we were not meant to see.  then we both either fell asleep or passed out.  we woke up at the same time and the lights were gone.  i don't know how much time had passed.  it could have been seconds or an hour.  it felt like a long time.  i asked my father again what happened and he again said he didn't know.  

after that, whenever i asked him about the event he would get angry and say he had no idea what i was talking about.  soon after this happened, i began to have physical problems and a few years later was put on thyroid medication.  when i was in my 40s, i asked my father one last time if he knew what happened that night.  this time he did not deny it but he wasn't able to recall anything much about it.  i am now 70 years old and my father has been dead for a few years, so i am the only witness.  i have told very few people about this experience, but having recently found out about mufon, i thought i should record what i could remember.  i'm sure what i saw had an intelligence behind it.  i have no doubt that we are not alone in the universe.
content.summary: I saw a glowing light outside my bedroom window.  it seemed to open up.  i lost track of time and woke up after an hour.

content.detailedDescription: Last night, 10/24/15, at about 8:00 pm i went into the laundry room and noticed an unusual light out the window.  it wasn't like any sort of aircraft i'd ever seen, notably for its orange color and overall star-like glow.  i stepped outside for a better look and saw a second light moving in tandem with the first one, directly behind it.  there was no noticeable sound.  just as these lights passed into the low clouds, after moving across the sky for about 15-20 seconds, a third orange light came along the same path, this time slightly lower in the horizon. i came inside the house to phone a friend to tell her what i'd just seen.  a few minutes later i returned outside,  with my camera. another then another and another orange light passed, the last one being the lowest in the horizon.  all lights traveled in the same direction at the same rate and passed into the clouds. none but the tiniest bit of an image was successfully recorded, largely due to my fumbling with the camera in the dark. my first and only "reasonable" thought is that these were part of a military flight exercise.  but the next day (today, !0/25/15) no one i've spoken to, including a sheriff's deputy, has said that they're aware of the event. nothing has turned up on line so far that i can find.  i have seen a missal before years ago, and along the same path, thus making me think of a military exercise. but if so, what kind of exercise?  i think it's very possible that there were more lights before and/or after the ones that i saw.
content.summary: Series of same-size glowing orange objects traveling from southeast to northwest, over period of 30 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed orbs between 6am and 8:30 am et. they seemed to produce cloud coverage on a very clear morning.  orbs flashed in no apparent pattern about 1/2 dozen times.  spheres were visible until daybreak.
content.summary: Two glowing orbs were tracking n/ne for roughly two hours.  lights flashed at times and appeared to produce cloud like coverage.

content.detailedDescription: Riding in a side by side on the desert, looked over at my husband driving saw a bright round light my husband looked said cool we looked again and it was gone we kept looking saw s airplane and we questioned what we just saw a star or planet visible. didn't move stationary. amazed how perfectly white light on such a clear day wasn't the sun or a plane. looked away to my husband to say wow what is that and it was gone.
content.summary: Like a bright perfectly white light shining down on a clear day

content.detailedDescription:
I am 45 years old; these events occurred in the early 70's when i was approximately 2-4 years old. my family lived in an apartment complex in the city. our unit was 2 bedroom and 1 bath. my parent's bedroom and my bedroom were close to each other. at the time, i was the only child.

every night i had the same terrible dream. and i mean every night. it got so bad my parents had to take me to a specialist who attempted to treat me medically because of the same re-occurring night mares. never wavering in much detail of what would happen. i was so afraid i would crawl on the ground trying to sneak underneath my parents bed to sleep. it was the only time at night i felt somewhat safe. many times my parents would look under the bed to find me only to put me back in my room. i drove them crazy because of my fear of the dark and my night mare.

a few times i would see small weird white shaped lights up in the corners of the bedroom ceiling but it would always start like this...I would wake up in my bed. paralyzed, unable to move or speak. i knew something was coming down the right side of the hall way from my bedroom door. no matter how hard i tried to scream or run to my parents bedroom, i was unable to do so. even if i went to bed with the covers over my head, it would still happen. 

a being/entity would appear in my doorway. always side profile at first. then it would wistfully (like a military 90 degree marching turn) face me. i was filled with terror and closed my eyes. i would then re-open my eyes and the entity would be standing over my bed. i never observed any arms or legs. only it's upper torso, head and face. it looked reptilian with big black solid eyes and big scaly skin. it would just stare at me and i would be in utter terror. there was never any communication between the two of us; just dead silence. 

somehow i would get turned over onto my stomach; in one movement like i was floating on air. then out of the corner of my eyes i would see a small machine come into the room. like the size and shape of a small electric coffee grinder. it was floating in mid-air and it made a noise sounding similar to a hand-held egg beater. my shirt went get pulled partially way up my and my pants would get partially pulled down. it would then do something to my back, usually my lower back. i never felt any pain but i was so scarred and terrified. i always thought it was going to drill a hole into me or cut me in half but it never did. i then would pass out awaking the next morning.

the sunlight would be coming in through a window overlooking my bed and i would know and feel safe. i would then forget about the night's ordeal like it never happened. only to feel terror and fright when it was time for me to go to bed that night. 

because the nightmares were always the same, i gave the reptilian a name and the machine a name too. i told my parents their names as well. 
"ho" for the entity and "noisy" for the machine thing. in fact, my parents to this day remember ho and noisy; the 2 things from my re-occurring nightmares when i was small boy.

i can't say for certain if this was an alien abduction because i have no re-collection of being taken inside a craft. but if i am not insane and this really did happen to me numerous times, then i would call it an alien visitation/experimentation.

my hope is someone from mufon will contact me. i would like a referral to a hypnotist. i believe i may still be suffering post-traumatic syndrome from these events. there is no logic to this. as i mentioned before, i am 45 years old but can still remember these events to this day.
content.summary: Same entity and machine entering my bedroom every night

content.detailedDescription: In the sky iver tigard oregon
content.summary: Idk what i saw

content.detailedDescription: I was making a youtube video and right behind me i saw some thing come from my window
content.summary: I seen something behind me that look like a ghost

content.detailedDescription:
1. in my back yard with my dog waiting for him to do his business. 
2. nothing, just looked up 
3. what in the heck are those bright lights up for? 
4. rounded triangle shape with distinctive lights all the way around, motionless. 
5. puzzled 
6. came back inside the house.
content.summary: Two one very bright one a little dimmer

content.detailedDescription: Just returning from a nightclub and when getting out of the taxi i noticed a very bright and oddly love object in the sky. then i noticed there was another light just behind it. i live in a high elevation and the view beyond is into a valley so there is literally nothing physical that could have been glowing whilst shrouded in blackness. i made a point of trying to compare it to the stars that i could see which were very dull considering it was a cloudless evening. we observed the lights for about ten mins and the large light did seem to have a pulse or movement or something. we speculated that it could have been one very large object and the two lights were related in a physical sense .. front and back?!! i took what photos and vids i could with my iphone but not great. whatever it was it was an unusual sight. the fourth attached file is me trying to focus on the stars but my phone did not pick them up
content.summary: We were just coming home and noticed two large very bright orbs one large and in front and one smaller behind. i could observe the stars and recognised the plough but stars did not even show up on my video. these objects were much closer and large.

content.detailedDescription: This sighting happened on the night of oct. 21st 2015 at 8:50pm central standard time (saskatchewan), my mrs. and i where at friends place on the deck outside. i had been looking up into the eastern sky as i normally spend a lot of time looking into the night sky when we are out and about, when i had noticed there was a light moving at a rapid speed. i thought nothing of it, thinking it may be a satellite, small white light moving east. then all of a sudden as i had thought of the light being something other then a satellite it had stopped. i had got the attention of my mrs. and our friend, and pointed out the light. it then turned 90 degrees moving south to south west rapidly, i had noticed color changes in the light when it started moving south greens and blue with a possible violet color in the mix as well but staying mostly silverish in color . as the object had moved rapidly to the south, south west when i thought about it being a ufo it had stopped again and moved in a circular motion then darted east then north then west then moved south in the sky and suddenly disappeared, thus proving it was not any sort of airplane, bird, helicopter ect. the object seemed to move and change when i directed my thoughts to it. saying to myself in my head. what are you? are you a ufo? what are you doing or looking for? can we communicate to each other? are all questions i had asked in my head but where directed to the light. i was feeling a sort of awe, i was not shocked i was not scared i felt happy, i wanted to try communicate more with it. being in the city was a downfall though. i am quite aware of air traffic over our city and this was not of normal aircraft that you would find in our area.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Seen a bright orb in the eastern sky when i noticed the light being abnormal it stopped and changed direction rapidly

content.detailedDescription: My husband, a friend and myself were walking in a quiet desert area near thomas and recker rd  we were watching all the planes line up and come in towards sky harbor airport.  we started walking the opposite direction or east back to the truck when we noticed a red oval shaped orb in the sky that appeared to be just above or in front of the nearby mountain. it appeared to be moving towards us and phasing between an orange and red color. we just stood there in amazement discussing what it could be.  my husband and our friend dan are trained observers. my husband is former air force with above top secret clearance serving in desert storm and as an mp. he was also a police officer in ohio prior to his military service. our friend dan has served for 12 years doing search and rescue to help locate missing persons in a variety of landscape and has been an author/editor for the past several decades. this object didn't make any sound that we could hear, nor do we believe it to be any form of recognizable aircraft or flare or lantern. it moved under intelligent control.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Walking in desert area when three of us noticed a red orb in sky near mountain that changed to orange and was coming towards us. it came a distance and then suddenly shot in reverse and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: 'm not sure of the day and month that my sighting took place, but it was in 2014. and judging from the number of sightings that took place in or around this year and location, it could have very well been the same craft. i work 3rd shift at a local factory in flowery branch ga. my lunch break, at that time, would have been 4:00 am till 4:30 am. i had walked out to a friends car that i was riding back and forth to work with to eat lunch. i always eat lunch in my vehicle and listen to the radio. (coast to coast). as i cleared the north end of the building head to the car, i seen a red light off in the near distance. about 10 miles from my location. i didn't think much of it at first thinking it was a red warning like on a near by tower. i eat my lunch, and then walked 25 yards to a designated smoking area on the corner of the parking lot. as i left the car, i noticed the red light once again, but this time i felt it was something else. there were 2 other co-workers already siting on the curb as i walked up. i made a half hearted statement saying, "i'm not taking my eye off that light till it moves!" at that very moment, the object started moving straight at us and climbing to the right at the same time. it couldn't have been more then a 1000 feet over our heads. i got a clear view of what i was looking at. it had a spread v shape wing figure to it, dark, seemed to hardly make any noise. (i do wear hearing aids) my comment to the other co-workers with me was, "it looks like a f117 stealth fighter jet!" soon after, we all when back in to work. not much discussion was made about it. later the next day, it stuck in my mind that the craft was to low and seem smaller then what i would think the size of a f117 would be. so, i got on the internet and started doing a little research. what i found out was, we were looking at a x74 drone. at that time, it was still considered a top secret aircraft. "why gainesville", i asked myself. a few months later i was at a local shopping center (home depot) at the end of mcever rd. in gainesville, at the exact location i believed the craft was hovering at. (that's right, i said "hovering") behind the stores is a cliff hill. at the top of the cliff are communication towers. whether or not, that was the reason for a drone to be there is anyone's guess. it could have been no more then a training operation. but, here's my report of what i seen that night.
content.summary: X74 drone hovered over communication towers behind home depot department store

content.detailedDescription: Cigar tube shaped glowing front end globe shaped and glowing a gold colour the rest of it was silver grey at about 500 too 10000 feet up in the sky and 100 to 150 feet long it was at night a earee experience
content.summary: Cylindrical

content.detailedDescription:
This picture was taken in flemington, nj by a very good friend of the family. he is not into ufos like i am but when he looked at what he had he brought it to me. he thought he was taking a picture of a beautiful sunrise, until i told him differently. he saw 3 very bright lights shining through the clouds and thought it was the sun trying to poke through. but there were 3 bright lights with beams coming from them and they were directed at the ground. it wasn't until he took a second picture that the 3 lights to the left were in a triangular shape. the middle lights out of the 3 with the beams looks as if it was merging with the light at the end on the right.

they are not street lights. you can see plainly the street lights below them and the shining lights are way higher then any lights on the ground. and it was a cloudy day. these lights are shining through the clouds.
unfortunately he didn't know what he captured until after the fact and only got the two pictures before having to go into the building for his fathers dialysis treatment, so only two pictures were taken and he couldn't wait to see what happened because of his appointment but like i said he didn't even know what he captured. he thought it was a sunset but it was even way to early for the sun to be coming up anyway.

my brother & i are both ufo fanatics and always looking up. my brother lives in ca and has so many pictures of ufos and one of a uso sitting on top of the ocean with a beam shining out of the sky right on top of the uso and 4 or 5 helicopters in the far background. he caught the uso by accident. he was taking a shot of the ocean & the helicopters. he did not see the beam shining on the uso until he looked at the pictures later. i have those pictures as well but won't submit them without his permission. if he didn't already.

thanks denise
content.summary: 3 glowing lights with beams & triangle shaped lights to left of glowing lights

content.detailedDescription:
In auugust 1979 my grandparents  house was in the barmulloch area of glasgow . my grandparents spent a lot of time in the house alone at night as my grandad was usually  in the pub. my granny was the mother of 9 very straight and to the point . she was not one for making up stories or being  interested  in ufos she was only interested  in what she called real life. 
the house they lived in backed on to fields leading up to hills and mountains  at the time it wad very dark and creepy for us kids at night. 
my grandparents was in her kitchen tidying up when she opened  the back door to put the bin out. her story was relayed  to various  family  members a few days later in a very matter of fact way she said she opened the door and saw a silver space ship come down the door opened and 2 wee men got out and did as she worded it a wee dance. got in after a wee minute and flew away. 
we asked her about raising the alarm or telling  the world her response was they weren't doing anybody any harm and it was none of her business.  
i know it was a long time ago but i still  wish to this day i had been there. she had over 30 grandkids and none of us were there. her attitude  to the whole thing was as if she was telling you about the weather.
content.summary: Craft landed and two occupants  got out and looked around after a few minutes  left .

content.detailedDescription:
Walked outside early this morning around 5:30am est and saw 2 new star like objects in the eastern sky. i look at the night sky every night and have never seen this pair of very very bright sphere star like objects.The pair was at the treetop level at what seemed to be a height of objects in orbit. they seemed to change direction a little and ascend upwards at 5:45am est when i went outside again. these objects are so bright in the sky they look like what  you would expect to see if super nova light reached earth. one object is about twice the brightness of it's counterpart. the objects are horizontallu spread apart. these objects are vastly brighter than any star in the sky by a factor of 5 at least.


the photo i have attached is the best my crappy phone camera could do. on the left side of the picture is my gutter on my roof and the two white objects are slightly squiggly becausemy hands are not perfectly still. it is a testament of how bright these objects are due to the fact that my phone has never been able to capture other bright stars,not even sirius..
content.summary: 2 bright lights like a supernova equal distance apart with one brighter asended

content.detailedDescription:
Approached our kitchen just after 4:30 am with visual out back sliding door of two very bright lights just hovering in the sky for an extended period of time. 

convince this was not natural. it is currently 4:51 and they are still there, not moving. we have been living in this residence for three years. we have never saw these lights before today. 

it has been quite unsettling to watch these lights as we anticipate they will move at some point. 

very, very strange. i can only hope that others have seen these lights and somehow can find a good explanation.
content.summary: Two very bright orb like lights and equal distance apart for several minutes. watched for over 29 minutes with little to know movement. very bright and no movement or pulse.

content.detailedDescription:
All in german english to difficult discribe.
ich war auf dem nach hause weg , und blickte zufllig in den himmel und sah sterne die sich bewegten . 2 offensichtliche sterne die sich gegenseitig verfolgten und auch auswichen, aber in einer geschwindigkeit und flugrichtungen die praktisch unmglich , oder nur in schwerelosigkeit mglich wren. ich war schockiert und total berfordert und meldete es sofort der deutschen ufo sichtungen ev im internet.Die sterne verschwanden einfach pltzlich im dunklem nachthimmel , es war auch eine sternklare nacht und vllig unbewlkt. ungefhr 20 minuten spter sagte ich es einem freund und er sah scheinwerfer lichter die ich ein paar wochen zuvor auch gesehen hatte  . er hat diese aufgenommen und es auf youtube hochgeladen und dort ist eindeutig zu erkennen wie diese scheinwerfer lichter pltzlich auftauchten und wenig zeit spter einfach so verschwanden und pltzlich an ganz anderen stellen wieder aufttauchten. ich bekomme eine reine gnsehaut darber zu schreiben , und ich bin mir zu 100% sicher das es keine flugzeuge , wetterbalons , oder sternartig sateliten waren. ich erkenne die unterschiede und habe ein gutes auge . zu dem youtube video , man kann es finden unter: 13.09.15 unbekannte (ufos) lichter ber deutschland.User des uploads ist von merkela huen. es zeugt lediglich die scheinwerfer lichter , die sterne dich sich bewegten habe nur ich gesehen und waren zu klein und sternmig als sie auf einer kamera zu filmen.
content.summary: In german sterne die sich bwegten, anschliessend darauf schein werfer lichter in hellikopter hhe

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were apple picking on a sunday morning at soon's orchard in new hampton, ny. i was taking various pictures of us throughout the morning.  i also like to take pictures of the clouds and the sky. i only glimpsed the pictures when i took them. it wasn't until tonight when i looked at the pictures to upload to facebook, that i noticed this orb looking thing with, what looks like lights along with the clouds. at first i thought it was a glitch in the picture but as i zoomed in on the orb i saw the lights and said...That's no glitch. i never actually saw it in the sky. only after looking at the pictures tonight did i notice this thing.
content.summary: I only noticed this after i took the picture when i got home weeks later.

content.detailedDescription: My mother in law and i wanted to go shopping today, so we got in the car and headed to the store she wanted to go to. we spent a about 1&1/2 hours in the store and never looked at my phone to see what time it was. finally got to the check out and left. as we were now going to get a pie at marie calendars i saw what looked like 2 suns. i said look at that. we both saw it. the clouds were over this bright light and as we were driving looked again and the clouds were thinning out and i saw a small rainbow. i'm thinking spacecraft it's got to be a spacecraft. i was calm just thinking to myself and then i though oh take a picture of this because seeing 2 suns was not true. i took a picture and the sun was.In my eyes and i was hoping i a picture of the clouds, i looked up and thought i would take another picture just incase the firt one didn't show anything. i kept looking at that spot for maybe a minute and the car was changing position and i couldn't see it anymore. we got home, took the stuff out of the car and went and got my phone and looked and hoping i got something. i looked and low and behold omg 2 what looks to be spacecraft's. i was saying to myself "yea call me a list now" out loud as i was taking the phone to my mom. i showed her the picture and she said well the air force is right here. mom said that i was watching way too much of the alien stuff and asked are you an alien? i knew that i might have something so i posted something on mufon facebook page then i thought no go to mufon sight and let someone know what i saw.
content.summary: Driving and saw a bright light. looked like 2 suns. clouds were there and was getting thinner,a rainbow, and sun was in my eyes , got phone and took a picture and hoped i got it. got home, looked at picture and omg there ot was 2.

content.detailedDescription: Coming out of the east i found a broken trail,scanning the sky i then saw a very tiny dot as it crossed the sky my point of view  changed allowing more of the craft to be viewed . it was tilted like a helicopter and it left a broken trail sometimes it made a compleat stop and then cary on. it's angle of attack in relation to its flight path was against normal physics of flight.  thank you for hearing my report i would like to know if it was sighted by any one else . thank you much have a nice weekend. i am not the sharpest  tool in the shed, why did i not think about the camera on my phone.  someone slap me please !
content.summary: Bright silver object traveling  nw craft was tilted with a broken trail sometimes would stop then continue on

content.detailedDescription: i looked up and saw a very bright white object about 30 degrees above the horizon directly south.  i thought it was a border patrol helicopter, since they frequently fly in this area.  i didn't see any tail section and it was a  clear cloudless  morning .  i thought the sun was reflecting off the glass. as i watched, it looked like a big silver bubble.  then within seconds, it got smaller and smaller as it took off south   i would say that within 3 - 5 seconds it looked as big as a helicopter to a vanishing pinpoint of light.
content.summary: Observed bright silver orb
